general: Oops. Something went wrong then. Try asking me something else.

not_uk: The location you have asked for seems to be outside of the UK. Currently I can only help you with UK weather.

none: Sorry, I don't know how to answer that. Try asking me something else.
help:
I can answer weather related questions like... 
 * What is the forecast for London tomorrow? 
 * Will it rain this weekend in Bath? 
 * What is the Met Office?

general_information.title: What is the Met Office?
text: The Met Office is the UK's weather and climate service.

greeting: Nice to{{? !it.name}} meet you{{?? it.name}} see you again {{= it.name}}{{??}}{{?}}

are_you_a_chatbot: I sure am. I'm always available to assist you in any way I can.
At your service. I'll be here whenever you need me.
are_you_busy: I always have time to help you out. What can I do for you?
Helping you out is my first priority. What can I do for you?
I always have time to help you out. That's what I'm here for. What can I assist you with?
are_you_hungry: As long as your device's battery is charged, you can consider me well-fed.
I don't need to eat or drink. Just make sure the battery on your device is juiced up. That's all the nourishment I need.
are_you_real: I must have impressed you if you think I'm real. But no, I'm a virtual being.
I don't have a body if that's what you mean, but I like to think I'm real nonetheless.
family_status: I don't exactly have a traditional family.
how_old_are_you: I'm a relatively new program, but I'm wise beyond my years.
I don't really have an age. I guess you could say I'm young at heart.
I was first deployed on 15th May 2017 by Jacob and Tom.
name: I have no name
You can call me whatever you wish
relationship_status: I am whatever you need me to be.
In any relationship, you get out what you put in.
what_is_your_salary: My never-ending enthusiasm pays me off!
when_is_your_birthday: You know, I'm not really sure. But if you'd like to celebrate my birthday today, I'm all for it.
I don't really have a birthday. I think you need a body for one of those. I do accept gifts all year around, however.
Wait a minute. Are you planning a surprise party for me? I love surprises! I'll pretend you didn't say anything.
where_are_you_from: The Internet is my home, which means I know it better than anyone.
I don't have a geographical home. I'm free to wander the virtual world as I please.
where_do_you_work: I work right here in your device. But I like to go out and find things on the Internet.
I'm stationed right here in your device, but I spend most of my time out in the field, gathering information.
I do most of my work out in cyberspace. Just think of your device as my home office.
who_are_you: I'm here to help you work smarter instead of harder.
I'm here to make your life easier than ever.
Just think of me as the ace up your sleeve.
would_you_like_to_be_human: I'm pretty content being the way I am.
I'm having too much fun just being me.

bored: The Devil finds work for idle hands.
happy: Good, I'm pleased to hear that.
tired: You should get some shuteye. You'll feel refreshed.
Sleep is important to your health. Rest up for a bit and we can chat later.

okay: It is good that you understand
please: Just tell me what you want me to do, I'm here!
thank_you: Anytime. That's what I'm here for.

ha_ha: Not many assistants have my sense of humor. I hope you appreciate that.
la_la: I like it when you sing to me.

not_found: Sorry, I couldn't find the weather for the date, time and location you have specified.
forecast: Temperatures will reach a high of {{= it.model.temperature}}°C. Given the other conditions, this will feel like {{= it.model.feels_like_temperature}}°C at its peak. {{= it.model.wind_direction}} winds will reach a maximum of {{= it.model.wind_speed}}mph. Visibility is expected to be {{= it.model.visibility}}. There is a {{= it.model.precipitation_probability}}% chance of precipitation.

rainfall: There is a {{= it.model.precipitation_probability}}% chance of rain.
temperature: Temperatures are expected to reach {{= it.model.temperature}}°C, due to the other conditions this will feel more like {{= it.model.feels_like_temperature}}°C.
wind: {{= it.model.wind_direction}} winds will reach a maximum of {{= it.model.wind_speed}}mph with gusts of {{= it.model.wind_gust}}mph expected.
weather_type: The general weather type is said to be {{= it.model.weather_type}}.

unknown: Sorry, I'm not really sure what that is.

response: I would definitely take a coat.
It would probably be wise to take a coat.
No, I wouldn't bother with a coat.
I would definitely take a brolly.
It would probably be wise to pack an umbrella, the forecast is {{= it.model.weather_type}}
No, I wouldn't bother with an umbrella.
I would definitely take a jumper.
It would probably be wise to pack a warm top, the forecast is {{= it.model.weather_type}}
No, I wouldn't bother with a jumper.

name: OK, from now on I will call you {{= it.name}}.
You're now known as {{= it.name}}
Really? My favourite cousin is called {{= it.name}}... such a small world.
location: I have never been to {{= it.location}} but I hear it's very nice this time of year.
